messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Neopets and Destructo Match
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/15/03 10:24:34 AM, louisaem@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/15/03 10:24:34 AM, louisaem@... writes:

<< Sandra, it warms my heart to know I'm not the only mom out here earning
"boffo" points on Destructo Match for her kids. LOL >>

It is quite the "mom game," isn't it?

The Nintendo games I've become good at (some of the only ones that even
caught my personal "hand me the controller" interest) are Dr. Mario and
Kirby's Avalanche, both cascading pattern games.

One night a year and some ago, there was a show-down. I was upstairs doing
something, and heard the Dr. Mario music from downstairs. I went down and
Mary said he knew it would lure me down. Turns out they had a male teenaged
friend who was also good at Dr. Mario, and they wanted me to play him.
Pressure! I lost, but barely and after a long, long set.

So they planned and out'n'out tournament. Several kids practiced. I lost to
Eric, that same guy, but he didn't win at all easily. <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: Neopets and Destructo Match
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/14/03 10:27:30 AM Pacific Standard Time, ... Sandra, it warms my heart to know I m not the only mom out here earning boffo points on
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/14/03 10:27:30 AM Pacific Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:


> I played Neopets on my account AND Holly's and then Marty's, trying to
> transfer our points over into his bank account (which is up to 140 NP
> interest per day), and trying to break 1000 on Destruct-o-Match.
>

Sandra, it warms my heart to know I'm not the only mom out here earning
"boffo" points on Destructo Match for her kids. LOL Lanora finally asked me
to stop doing it on her account cuz she was feeling guilty about the points
not being "earned". Now Jonathan is racking them up like crazy. *grin*

Kris
